column1: ==Films==
2001-03: The Lord of the Rings (film series):
:Shire scenes were shot on location in Matamata
column3: the area was returned to its natural state
column4: but even without Hobbit holes it became a prime tourist attraction.

column1: 2012-14: The Hobbit (film series):
:Shire scenes were shot at the same place where shooting of The Lord of the Rings (film series) took place. Unlike the previous time
column2: Hobbiton was constructed out of permanent materials
column3: with intention of lasting for decades.

column1: ==Games==
2002: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game):
:The first three levels of the game take place in the Shire
column2: from Frodo leaving Bag End up until the entrance into the Old Forest.

column1: 2003: The Hobbit (2003 video game):
:The Shire is the first level of the game. Unlike the original story
column2: Bilbo has to perform various side-quests before he ever reached Green Dragon.

column1: 2006: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II:
:The Shire is a battleground appearing in Evil campaign and skirmish mode.
2007: The Lord of the Rings Online:
:The Shire is one of the major regions of the game
column2: represented almost in its entirely - of the original map by Christopher Tolkien only some parts of Westfarthing and Southfarthing are not represented. Also
column3: part of the Northfarthing is placed within the borders of Evendim region for gameplay purposes. The Shire is inhabited by hundreds of non-playable characters

column1: 2009: The Lord of the Rings: Conquest:
:The Shire is one of games battlegrounds
column2: razed by Saurons forces in the Evil campaign.
